The Oblitercons/Manterror/Double Punch/Injector:


Breakdown heard Zardus' com, firing off another grenade, this one hitting an 
autogun, which had not opened fire on his.  "Return to base!" the others 
followed him, outside of the Ark, Dark One joining them with Hiss, all of the 
heading back to base.

---
Manterror, Double Punch, and Injector headed for base.
